cont.entity_a: Well-built and well-designed. Very small size, not ergonomic, uncomfortable for larger hands.
cont.entity_b: Ambidextrous design makes it uncomfortable for prolonged use. Ergonomic design is lacking, uncomfortable for large hands.

cont.entity_a: Responsive and suitable for Photoshop use.
Wheel stopped working after 14 months. Durable with long-lasting performance.
Very small size, not ergonomic, uncomfortable for larger hands. Not suitable for large hands, better for small hands.
cont.entity_b: Compact and portable, but smaller than average.
Ambidextrous design makes it uncomfortable for prolonged use.
Receiver design is convenient for travel.

cont.entity_a: Long enough cord for laptop use. Short cord requires USB extension for desktop use.
Corded mouse eliminates battery issues. No need for batteries.
cont.entity_b: Excellent connectivity and battery life. Battery compartment and buttons feel flimsy.

cont.entity_a: Side button and tilt scroll wheel with programmable functions.
cont.entity_b: Magnifier feature is highly valued but not functional without software.

cont.entity_a: Rubberized coating on sides wears down over time.
Good for general use but not recommended for gaming or 3D modeling.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for gaming due to smooth middle button.
Buttons are hard to click, and wheel is stiff. Mouse buttons require excessive force to click.
Excellent connectivity and battery life. Frequent signal loss and erratic cursor movement.
Laser sensor works on multiple surfaces. Short range and tracking issues.
